name: NLModel
desc: A custom model trained to classify or tag natural language text.

items.name: init(mlModel: MLModel)
items.desc: Creates a new natural language model based on the given Core ML model instance.

items.name: init(contentsOf: URL)
items.desc: Creates a new natural language model based on a compiled Core ML model at the given URL.

items.name: func predictedLabel(for: String) -> String?
items.desc: Predicts a label for the given input string.

items.name: func predictedLabels(forTokens: [String]) -> [String]
items.desc: Predicts a label for each string in the given array.

items.name: func predictedLabelHypotheses(for: String, maximumCount: Int) -> [String : Double]
items.desc: Predicts multiple possible labels for the given input string.

items.name: func predictedLabelHypotheses(forTokens: [String], maximumCount: Int) -> [[String : Double]]
items.desc: Predicts multiple possible labels for each string in the given array.

items.name: var configuration: NLModelConfiguration
items.desc: A configuration describing the natural language model.

items.name: class NLModelConfiguration
items.desc: The configuration parameters of a natural language model.
